sentences.sContent: The dog would not have attacked if it hadn’t been provoked.
sentences.sCn: 如果不是被惹恼了，那狗原本不会攻击的。

sentences.sContent: Paul tried to provoke Fletch into a fight.
sentences.sCn: 保罗试图激怒弗莱琪打一架。

remMethod.val: pro(在前) ＋ voke(呼喊) → 在某人前面呼喊 → 激怒

words.tran: 刺激的；令人生气的，激怒人的

trans.tranOther: to make someone angry, especially deliberately
